describe: Serbia is a landlocked country situated in Southeast Europe, in the central and western part of the Balkan Peninsula. Known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and diverse landscapes, Serbia offers a blend of medieval architecture, lively cities, and beautiful natural scenery.

cities.name: 游낋 Belgrade
cities.geographical_location: Located at the confluence of the River Sava and Danube, in the north-central part of Serbia.
cities.climate: Belgrade has a humid subtropical climate with four distinct seasons, featuring hot summers and cold winters.

cities.name: 游끻 Novi Sad
cities.geographical_location: Situated on the banks of the Danube River, in the northern part of Serbia.
cities.climate: Novi Sad experiences a continental climate with hot summers and cold, snowy winters.

cities.name: 游끲 Ni코
cities.geographical_location: Located in the southern part of Serbia, near the Ni코ava River.
cities.climate: Ni코 has a humid subtropical climate with hot summers and mild to cold winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Ni코ava Grilled Meat, Burek, and Ajvar
